Ещё
A cool little place that serves Chimay & other Belgian style beers on tap. Just make sure to bring Yuan/RMB because they don't take US credit cards. The food is hit or miss. Good fries and pub grub.

If you are a big fan of Belgian beers, this is a place to be: from traditional brews to the exotic fruit beers. The place also has a full bar, with innovative cocktails and food. Try the Belgian fries, the cold cuts or the hot dogs.
